attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Word reaches me that the UN and various world health organisations are planning a move called CODEX ALIMENTARIUS, which may chnage the way food is labelled, and plans to eliminate homeopathic and natural medicines. This affects every single one of us and must be stopped now.

I hereby request that the Prime Minister make immediate moves to stop this process. 

Ross Hemsworth

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
